|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS4350 |cpu1spd = 320 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR-S5C; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 28:10:7B, B8:A3:86, CC:B2:55 |oui = 28:10:7B, B8:A3:86, CC:B2:55 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = CFE;1.0.37-110.11;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21.5;OpenRG; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = DSL (ADSL2+) Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301;BROADCOM, 6301KSG, TD1122P1;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = ''randomly generated'' |defaultssid = 28107bXXXXXX, b8a386XXXXXX, ccb255XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^28107b[a-f0-9]{6}$,,, ^b8a386[a-f0-9]{6}$,,, ^ccb255[a-f0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = Gan5.CT02W |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/30/2011 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43225;BCM42335KMLG, HE1212 P20, 191469 3 W; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :This modem has been used by '''{{Used by service|Verizon}}'''. "GAN5.CT02W-B_2T2R", "REV1.0", and "005SP0439640A" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The default SSID pattern appears to be the MAC address (no delimiters, lower case hex letters). ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2015/03/24/inside-the-d-link-wireless-n300-adsl2-modem-router-dated-2012/ ''D-Link DSL-2750B'' on '''InsideGadgets'''] ===Technical Data=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dsl-2750b_t1 ''D-Link DSL-2750B rev T1'' on '''OpenWRT'''] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial header is populated on this device - it is '''J6'''. 
J6
(RxD) (GND) (TxD) (3.3)
Pin4  Pin3  Pin2  Pin1
        |
        /\
to WI <    > to SoC
====General==== The username and password (at least @ stock) would appear to be identical :to the HTTP admin ones.. which are printed on the unit's label. The firmware used is presumably '''Jungo''''s '''''OpenRG''''', or a derivative. ====Derived info==== [[/Serial info]] - Needs to be condensed before inclusion ==Pictures==
